article:

 | image = Microcystis aeruginosa.jpeg image_caption = [[Microcystis
 | aeruginosa]] name = Chroococcales regnum = Bacteria subregnum = Eubacteria
 | phylum = Cyanobacteria classis = Cyanophyceae ordo = 'Chroococcales'
 | ordo_authority = von Wettstein von Westerheim
}}

'Chroococcales' is an order of cyanobacteria in some classifications which
includes the harmful algal bloom [[Microcystis aeruginosa]]. Molecular data indicate that
the members of the Chroococcales may not be a clade.
